# Aseed Insight

> Customer development research: prepare and run interviews (including voice AI), then turn them into structured insights and reports.

## Getting started

- [Overview](/overview): Find the right guide for your task.
- [What is Aseed?](/what-is-aseed): How Aseed differs from general AI assistants for customer development research.
- [Workflow](/workflow): Project setup to report sharing, including AI Interviewer.
- [Quick Start: First Project](/quickstart): Create a project, prepare AI interviews, add recordings, and generate a report in minutes.
- [Research Assistant](/projects/context): Add research context and interview guides; ask questions about project reports with citations.

## Projects

- [Create a project](/projects/create): Set up a project to organize interviews, context, and reports.
- [AI Interviewer](/projects/ai-interviewer): Create interview links, run voice AI interviews, and store sessions as records.
- [Edit project](/projects/edit): Update project name, description, and status.
- [Manage projects](/projects/manage): Organize projects with filters, search, and status.
- [Upload records](/projects/upload-records): Add interview files to a project.
- [Manage records](/projects/manage-records): Rename, archive, delete, or remove records from a project.
- [Batch generation](/projects/batch-generation): Generate reports for multiple records in one run.

## Records

- [Records page](/interviews/records): View and manage all records in one table.
- [Upload records](/interviews/upload): Upload audio, video, or text files as new records.
- [Upload text transcripts](/interviews/text-transcripts): Import pre-written transcripts with parser selection.
- [Create interview guide](/interviews/guide-builder): Generate structured interview guides with AI.
- [Transcribe records](/interviews/transcribe): Configure language and speakers for transcription.
- [Edit transcripts](/interviews/edit): Review and correct transcripts before generating reports.

## Single Reports

- [Generate single reports](/reports/single): Per-interview reports: Transcript, Q&A, General, JTBD, Persona, Custom.
- [Edit and regenerate reports](/reports/edit): Refine and regenerate report output after review.

## Report types

- [Overview](/reports/report-types): Report types, structure, and use cases.
- [Transcript Report](/reports/report-types/transcript): Raw text from audio or video; foundation for other reports.
- [Q&A Report](/reports/report-types/qa): Structured question-answer pairs by topic with citations.
- [General Report](/reports/report-types/general): Profile, insights, and recommendations.
- [JTBD Report](/reports/report-types/jtbd): Jobs-to-be-Done with job stories and recommendations.
- [Persona Report](/reports/report-types/persona): Persona profile with motivations, pain points, and behavior.
- [Custom Report](/reports/report-types/custom): Tailored analysis from your prompt.

## Project Reports

- [Create a project report](/reports/project): Synthesize insights across multiple interviews into one report.
- [Use report presets](/reports/presets): Start from predefined report structures.
- [Build a custom report](/reports/custom): Design your own report structure and prompts.

## Sharing

- [Share reports publicly](/sharing/public): Create public links for stakeholders without Aseed accounts.
- [Export reports](/sharing/export): Download reports in DOCX or Markdown.

## Account & Billing

- [Account & Billing](/account/overview): Token balance, billing, and how tokens are used.
- [Purchase tokens](/account/purchase): Buy token packages.
- [Referral program](/account/referral): Earn tokens by inviting users.
- [Token usage](/account/usage): How tokens are consumed and charged.

## API Reference

- [API Reference](/api-reference/introduction): Public API reference for Aseed Insight.

## Changelog

- [Product updates](/changelog): Releases and product improvements.
